languages.text: Существо совершает дополнительную атаку за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} и получает +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, +100% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} и +50% ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}. Когда эффект стимулятора заканчивается, существо получает 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature gains an additional attack per turn, +4 AP, +100% damage, and +50% to all characteristics. Yet when the effect of the stimm ends, this creature suffers 120 mental damage.

languages.text: The creature gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and +50% to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. But when the effect of the stimm ends, this creature suffers 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

Когда эффект стимулятора заканчивается, существо получает 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The creature gains an additional attack per turn, +4 AP, +100% damage, and +50% to all characteristics. But when the effect of the stimm ends, this creature suffers 120 mental damage.

languages.text: La criatura gana un ataque adicional por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y +50 % a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}. Pero, cuando el efecto del estimulante se acabe, la criatura sufre 120 de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and +50% to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. But when the effect of the stimm ends, this creature suffers 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La criatura gana un ataque adicional por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, +100 % de daño y +50 % a todas las características. Pero, cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} del estimulante se acabe, la criatura sufre 120 de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得一次额外攻击机会，{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高4点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高50%。然而，当兴奋剂的效果结束时，此生物会承受120点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: The creature gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and +50% to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. But when the effect of the stimm ends, this creature suffers 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得一次额外攻击机会，{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高4点，造成的伤害提高100%，所有属性提高50%。然而，当兴奋剂的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}结束时，此生物会承受120点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。

此生物物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得一次额外攻击机会，{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高4点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高50%。然而，当兴奋剂的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}结束时，此生物会承受120点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。

languages.text: その生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの追加攻撃、+4の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}、+100%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を得て、さらに全{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+50%アップする。しかしその刺激剤の効果が切れると、この生物は120の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: The creature gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and +50% to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. But when the effect of the stimm ends, this creature suffers 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: その生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの追加攻撃、+4の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}、+100%のダメージを得て、さらに全特性が+50%アップする。しかしその刺激剤の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}が切れると、この生物は120の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

その生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの追加攻撃、+4の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}、+100%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を得て、さらに全{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+50%アップする。しかしその刺激剤の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}が切れると、この生物は120の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Die Kreatur erhält einen zusätzlichen Angriff pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +100 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und +50 % auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Wenn der Effekt der Stimulanz endet, erleidet diese Kreatur 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and +50% to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. But when the effect of the stimm ends, this creature suffers 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Kreatur erhält einen zusätzlichen Angriff pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +100 % Schaden und +50 % auf alle Eigenschaften. Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} der Stimulanz endet, erleidet diese Kreatur 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.

languages.text: La créature bénéficie d'une attaque supplémentaire par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, ainsi que de +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et +50 % sur toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}. Mais lorsque l'effet du stimulant se dissipe, elle subit 120 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and +50% to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. But when the effect of the stimm ends, this creature suffers 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La créature bénéficie d'une attaque supplémentaire par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, ainsi que de +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, +100 % de dégâts et +50 % sur toutes les caractéristiques. Mais lorsque l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} du stimulant se dissipe, elle subit 120 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.

languages.text: Yaratık, her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} ilave bir saldırı ve +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır. Tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} +%50, verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} da +%100 artar. Ancak yaratık, uyarıcının etkisi geçtiğinde 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: The creature gains an additional attack per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +100% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and +50% to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. But when the effect of the stimm ends, this creature suffers 120 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
